title: NO FEE! Super Spacious One Bed in Fantastic Brighton Location!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 41026694', 'Rent: $2,225 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: off-street parking', 'One bed with a spacious floorplan just steps from the green line and everything else Brighton has to offer!', 'The bedroom and living room are HUGE!', ' The bedroom features two spacious closets.', 'The building features card-op laundry and an elevator (but this unit is on the first floor).', 'Move-in costs are super low - no broker fee, no security deposit.', 'Heat and hot water included!', '-Very spacious', '-Great Brighton location', '-Laundry in Building', '-First floor', '-Includes Heat & Hot Water', '-No broker fee, no security deposit', 'FEATURES', 'Laundry in Building', 'Call or Text Michela Nionakis at 617-939-7425 for an immediate response!', 'Encore Realty', 'Share your search criteria with me here:', '<URL>', 'The information in this listing may have been gathered from third party sources including the owner and public records.', 'Listings are subject to errors and omissions.', 'Encore Realty disclaims any and all representations or warranties as to the accuracy of this information.', 'Encore Realty is an Equal Housing Opportunity Agency.', 'Photos may not always be of the actual apartment, at times sample images are used to make a general representation.']
